internal_links.placement_section: Den richtigen Verkaufspreis für dein Pferd ermitteln
internal_links.placement_context: After discussing manual pricing research methods, introduce the AI tool as a data-driven alternative
internal_links.reasoning: Highest relevance - AI valuation tool directly supports pricing section. Article mentions '/bewertung' placeholder 3x. Natural fit for users seeking objective pricing data.

internal_links.placement_context: When discussing buyer expectations for health documentation and transparency
internal_links.reasoning: Strong topical relevance - AKU is critical component of horse sales. Article already mentions AKU costs. Links to comprehensive AKU guide for sellers preparing documentation.

internal_links.placement_context: When advising sellers about supporting buyers during AKU process
internal_links.reasoning: High relevance - AKU cost transparency helps sellers set realistic expectations. Article mentions '/ratgeber/aku-pferd-kosten' placeholder. Supports buyer confidence building.

internal_links.placement_context: When discussing how to prepare for buyer questions and expectations
internal_links.reasoning: Medium-high relevance - Understanding buyer psychology improves sales success. Natural counterpart to selling guide. Helps sellers anticipate buyer concerns.

internal_links.placement_context: In conclusion when directing readers to additional resources
internal_links.reasoning: Medium relevance - Ratgeber hub link increases site exploration. Natural placement in conclusion for readers seeking related content. Supports content cluster structure.

internal_links.placement_context: When discussing market price ranges and buyer budget expectations

details.issue: Article placeholder URLs don't match sitemap structure

examples.action_required: Update article-draft.md placeholders to match canonical URLs
Update article-draft.md to use full canonical path
Verify if '/pferd-kaufen-checkliste' should be added to sitemap or placeholder should be updated

implementation_notes.anchor_text_strategy: All anchors are 2-6 words, natural language, keyword-rich but not over-optimized. No duplicate anchors to avoid Penguin penalty risk.
implementation_notes.placement_strategy: Links distributed across 4 different article sections for natural reading flow. Avoided clustering multiple links in single paragraph.
implementation_notes.diversity: Mix of tool links (AI valuation), informational ratgeber links (AKU, buying guide), and hub link (ratgeber main) for varied user journeys.
implementation_notes.user_value: Each link provides genuine value to readers at decision points in sales process - not manipulative SEO-only linking.
